content: this crochet snowflake pattern has 8 rounds and the finished size is about 3 3/4 the front post stitches and optional popcorn stitches adds texture to these snowflakes just a small amount of size 10 crochet thread is needed to make one pattern is written using u s terminology **materials needed** * size 10 thread- 20-40 yards * 1 75 mm hook * yarn needle * scissors **special stitches** * 2-fpdc decrease * 5-double_crochet popcorn * special fpdc decrease * 3-fpdc decrease * treble_crochet decrease * large picot * small picot * 2-double_crochet cluster
